alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 10:33AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in South Dakota... Iowa... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Sioux, Lincoln and Union Counties. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lyon, Minnehaha and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Brookings and Hamlin Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Canton affecting Sioux, Lyon and Lincoln Counties. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. Redwood River at Russell affecting Lyon County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in South Dakota... Medary Creek near Medary affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Redwood River at Russell. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, the right bank overflows flooding some low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Wednesday was 14.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Redwood River Russell 14.0 14.5 Wed 9 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1130 AM CDT.
